test-set.name: prod-DirElemConstructor
test-set.description: Tests for the DirElemConstructor (Direct Element Constructor) production

test-case.description: Empty element constructor

test-case.name: Constr-elem-empty-2
test-case.description: Empty element constructor with closing tag

test-case.description: Bind the 'xml' namespace URI to an invalid prefix.

test-case.description: Bind the 'xml' namespace URI to an invalid prefix(#2).

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElem-37
test-case.description: Bind the 'xml' namespace URI to an invalid prefix(#3).

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElem-38
test-case.description: Bind the 'xml' namespace URI to a valid prefix. The output doesn't expect the declaration because the c14n specification ignores declarations of the xml prefix if it binds to the XML namespace(see section 2.3). In either case, serializing this declaration is redundant. See the public report #4217 in W3C's Bugzilla database.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElem-39
test-case.description: Bind the 'xmlns' namespace URI to an invalid prefix(#3).

test-case.description: Bind the 'xmlns' namespace URI to an invalid prefix(#3).

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElem-42
test-case.description: Use a content sequence that is a strange combination of a computed document constructor and a path.

test-case.description: Use a content sequence that is a computed document constructor.

test-case.description: Extract the string value of a single element node.

test-case.description: Extract the typed value of a single element node.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElem-46
test-case.description: Use an element constructor that use a namespace declare in a prolog declaration.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElem-47
test-case.description: Use content that needs to be escaped, inside namespace declaration attributes.

modified.change: remove error XQST0022, as per bug 22335 (and bbug 13966)

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElem-48
test-case.description: In XQuery, as opposed to XML, the sequence ]]< is allowed in element content.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElem-49
test-case.description: In XQuery, as opposed to XML, the sequence ]]< is allowed in attribute content.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElem-50
test-case.description: Character < cannot appear in attributes.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElem-51
test-case.description: Ensure that whitespace normalization of xml:id is performed.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElem-52
test-case.description: Output sharp S.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElem-53
test-case.description: There is no 'namespace' constructor in XQuery 1.0.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElem-53a
test-case.description: There is a 'namespace' constructor in XQuery 3.0.

modified.change: Bug fix relating #27180: Added + to the dependency

test-case.name: K2-DirectConElem-54
test-case.description: There is no 'namespace-node' constructor in XQuery.

test-case.description: Checks the in-scope namespaces of directly constructed element.
